column5: Headed out this AM Hoping to get into a Whitie!!!   Some "Real" Fishing LOL  A change from Perch  Well  I found where the Jumbos are hiding   83' off IBP..  Started marking a LOT of Fish But could not Hook Up Finally pulled up My Biggest Perch of the Year a 14" er  I downsized a bit with the bait and All I got was Perch and here I thought I was marking the Motherload of Whities!!!   So No Whities or Lakers for ME.  But LOTS more PERCH  Saw one Laker iced no Whities.  Fished 5 different spots from 74 FOW to 86 FOW all holes drilled today About 6" of Ice(I was expecting a bit more, and I talked to a Guy on foot who said he cut a spot of only 4.5" ) and 3" of snow Good running with the Bike.  Not a LOT of Ice what with the crowd that will be there this weekend So BE CAREFUL and Play Safe   Rick
thanks for the report I will be heading out on the weekend lets hope we all figure out where the whitefish are
Sorry to hear you didn't get any whities but at least you didn't get skunked...  Thanks a bunch for the report!
Do perch seem to be deeper this year?  I can't recall pulling this number of perch up from 70+ feet in the past.  Seem to be 10 more females than males.  Maybe I keep throwing the males back.
we have been finding a lot of them deep but many years that's where I find them
Yes  I would say More This Year..I have picked up some in past years ...But not the numbers I have caught and have heard being caught!!  Rick
Terry  How's the camera work at 80 plus feet???  Rick
What, no pictures?? 80fow? 14", is that including the bladder sticking out?  thanks for the report Rick!
my other cameras did not work too well, between zooplankton and other stuff and Lack of light not too well I have not tried my new one deeper then 67 ft so I will see on sunday how well it does
I found the same thing perch were deep  and  no whities for me either ... its still early ... tight lines

here is video from simcoe 88 ft of water on a murky day  you really have to look to see the whitefish    <object width="480" height="385"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tizmLtz8HgI?fs=1&hl=en_US"></param><param'>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tizmLtz8HgI?fs=1&hl=en_US"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tizmLtz8HgI?fs=1&hl=en_US" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="480" height="385"></embed></object>
What ,you didnt believe my reports last weekend????????? LOL  Thanks for the report Rick.
Why are you in front of a computor? Shouldnt you be fishing?
things to do ,places to go, people to meet..... .= honey do list  I will be fishing tomorrow
Brian  Yes I did believe your reports!!!  That's why I waited a Week for More Ice,  With all the cold we have had this week I was excpecting to find more than 6"   Rick
I seen NAW this morning at tim,s.He was heading out to bbp.lets see what he reports back.
If Terry can get some Video  It will be intersting to see If the Whities are mixed in with the Perch   Rick
I am going to see if the new camera will see the fish in the deep water so lets hope I get lots to post about
Go for it Terry. Looking forward to the report but be careful out there.
Yes Roy I will, Joey will be with me and you would kick my butt if anything happened to her. so careful it is..LOL
out with 4 people today with 1 nice whitefish caught and tons of perch. Marked fish and had 2 fish on today. Real suttle bite. Cheers Jeff
